description: steaksoap curated MCP server registry — tools for Claude Code itself

mcp-servers.name: GitHub
mcp-servers.description: Manage repos, PRs, issues, and CI/CD from Claude Code.
mcp-servers.when: User wants to create PRs, manage issues, review code on GitHub, or automate Git workflows beyond local operations.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio github -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-github

mcp-servers.name: Context7
mcp-servers.description: Inject up-to-date library documentation into Claude's context. Eliminates hallucinated APIs.
mcp-servers.when: User is working with a library and Claude is unsure about the current API, or user says 'use context7' or asks for up-to-date docs.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio context7 -- npx -y @upstash/context7-mcp

mcp-servers.name: Playwright Browser
mcp-servers.description: Automate browser testing — navigate, click, fill forms, screenshot.
mcp-servers.when: User wants E2E tests, browser automation, web scraping, or visual regression testing.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio playwright -- npx -y @playwright/mcp --headless

mcp-servers.name: PostgreSQL
mcp-servers.description: Query and manage PostgreSQL databases with natural language.
mcp-servers.when: User has a PostgreSQL database and wants to query, migrate, or inspect it from Claude Code.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio postgres -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-postgres

mcp-servers.name: Figma
mcp-servers.description: Read Figma designs and translate them into code.
mcp-servers.when: User wants to implement a Figma design, or mentions 'Figma', 'design file', or 'mockup'.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio figma -- npx -y figma-developer-mcp

mcp-servers.name: Sentry
mcp-servers.description: Monitor errors, analyze stack traces, and debug production issues.
mcp-servers.when: User has Sentry and wants to check errors, investigate crashes, or monitor production.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio sentry -- npx -y @sentry/mcp-server

mcp-servers.name: Brave Search
mcp-servers.description: Web search from Claude Code. Privacy-first, no tracking.
mcp-servers.when: User needs to search the web for current info, documentation, or troubleshooting from Claude Code CLI.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio brave-search -- npx -y @brave/brave-search-mcp-server

mcp-servers.name: Cloudflare
mcp-servers.description: Deploy Workers, manage KV/R2/D1, configure DNS from Claude Code.
mcp-servers.when: User deploys on Cloudflare, uses Workers, KV, R2, D1, or Pages.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport stdio cloudflare -- npx -y @cloudflare/mcp-server-cloudflare

mcp-servers.name: Vercel
mcp-servers.description: Manage deployments, domains, environment variables on Vercel.
mcp-servers.when: User deploys on Vercel and wants to manage deployments, check logs, or configure domains.
mcp-servers.install: claude mcp add --transport http vercel https://mcp.vercel.com/mcp
